text: All these organic only people you many of them Wikipedia included are complaining that their traffic is dropping on this exponential curve which is true but it's not going away somebody else has that traffic and that revenue and I'm talking to a company right now I I can't name it but they grew from nothing to 600 million of revenue online in the last couple years 100 million on the bottom line in one of the main mainstream topics and the new formula for all the entrepreneurs out there is really straightforward bring huge amounts of AI generated content content, but good content. You put it online and you also pay Google and Facebook. You do not try and get free traffic like Wikipedia. You got to pay the man [laughter] because they control who gets the clicks. So, you pay them. You run your content in parallel with that. And you also optimize for what's called GEO. Now, you optimize for the AI engine so that your content is really helpful to the user in that engine. If you do those three things, you'll get all the users. They will give them to you. It's going somewhere. and just find that somewhere that it's going and do that and you'll be a billionaire in no time flesh.
